German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Herz +‎ -lich

Pronunciation[edit]

  • Audio
    		(file)

Adjective[edit]

herzlich (comparative herzlicher, superlative am herzlichsten)

  1. warm, warmhearted, friendly, affectionate, cordial
  2. hearty
